00089 #define USE_PIN_TRACES

00091 /* The uncore class is just a wrapper around the last-level cache,
00092    front-side-bus and memory controller, plus relevant parameters.
00093  */
00094 
00095 static char * LLC_opt_str = (char *)"LLC:4096:16:64:16:64:9:L:W:B:8:1:8:C";
00096 static int LLC_bus_ratio = 1;
00097 static int LLC_access_rate = 1;
00098 static char * LLC_MSHR_cmd = (char *)"RPWB";
00099 
00100 /* LLC prefetcher options */
00101 static char * LLC_PF_opt_str[MAX_PREFETCHERS];
00102 static int LLC_num_PF = 0;
00103 static int LLC_PFFsize = 8;
00104 static int LLC_PFthresh = 2;
00105 static int LLC_PFmax = 1;
00106 static int LLC_PF_buffer_size = 0;
00107 static int LLC_PF_filter_size = 0;
00108 static int LLC_PF_filter_reset = 0;
00109 static int LLC_WMinterval = 10000;
00110 static bool LLC_PF_on_miss = false;
00111 static double LLC_low_watermark = 0.1;
00112 static double LLC_high_watermark = 0.3;
00113 
00114 /* constructor */
00115 uncore_t::uncore_t(
00116     unsigned int arg_id,
00117     const double arg_cpu_speed,
00118     const unsigned int arg_vcs,
00119     unsigned int arg_tile_count)
00120 : id(arg_id),
00121   cpu_speed(arg_cpu_speed),
00122   virtual_channels(arg_vcs),
00123   tile_count(arg_tile_count)
00124 {
00125   /* temp variables for option-string parsing */
00126   char name[256];
00127   int sets, assoc, linesize, latency, banks, bank_width, MSHR_banks, MSHR_entries, WBB_entries;
00128   char rp, ap, wp, wc;
00129 
00130   /*The number of cores per node is a variabled declared in the simMc2mesh.cc file*/
00131   num_cores= cores_per_node;
00132 
00133   /*Initialising the uncore stats*/    
00134   stat.packets_out = 0;
00135   stat.packets_in = 0;
00136   stat.min_pkt_latency = 999999999;
00137   stat.last_packet_out_cycle = 0;
00138   stat.fwd_path_delay = 0;
00139   stat.round_trip_lat = 0;
00140   stat.round_trip_hop_count = 0;
00141   stat.round_trip_network_latency = 0;
00142   stat.round_trip_memory_latency = 0;
00143   stat.waiting_in_ni = 0;
00144 
00145   lastSentTime = 0;
00146   /*Setting the ready events for all VC's to default state*/  
00147   ready.resize( virtual_channels );
00148 //  ready.insert( ready.begin(), ready.size(), false );
00149   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < ready.size(); i++)
00150       ready[i] = true;
00151 
00152   /* Shared LLC */
00153   if(sscanf(LLC_opt_str,"%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%d:%c:%c:%c:%d:%d:%d:%c",
00154       name,&sets,&assoc,&linesize,&banks,&bank_width,&latency,&rp,&ap,&wp, &MSHR_entries, &MSHR_banks, &WBB_entries, &wc) != 14)
00155     fatal("invalid LLC options: <name:sets:assoc:linesize:banks:bank-width:latency:repl-policy:alloc-policy:write-policy:num-MSHR:MSHR-banks:WB-buffers:write-combining>\n\t(%s)",LLC_opt_str);
00156 
00157   LLC = cache_create_llc(NULL,name,CACHE_READWRITE,sets,assoc,linesize,rp,ap,wp,wc,banks,bank_width,latency,WBB_entries,MSHR_entries,MSHR_banks,0,0,NULL,NULL);
00158   if(!LLC)
00159         fatal("failed to calloc LLC");  
00160 
00161 
00162   LLC->uncore= this;
00163   if(!LLC_MSHR_cmd || !strcasecmp(LLC_MSHR_cmd,"fcfs"))
00164     LLC->MSHR_cmd_order = NULL;
00165   else
00166   {
00167     if(strlen(LLC_MSHR_cmd) != 4)
00168       fatal("-LLC:mshr_cmd must either be \"fcfs\" or contain all four of [RWBP]");
00169     bool R_seen = false;
00170     bool W_seen = false;
00171     bool B_seen = false;
00172     bool P_seen = false;
00173 
00174     LLC->MSHR_cmd_order = (enum cache_command*)calloc(4,sizeof(enum cache_command));
00175     if(!LLC->MSHR_cmd_order)
00176       fatal("failed to calloc MSHR_cmd_order array for LLC");
00177 
00178     for(int c=0;c<4;c++)
00179     {
00180       switch(mytoupper(LLC_MSHR_cmd[c]))
00181       {
00182         case 'R': LLC->MSHR_cmd_order[c] = CACHE_READ; R_seen = true; break;
00183         case 'W': LLC->MSHR_cmd_order[c] = CACHE_WRITE; W_seen = true; break;
00184         case 'B': LLC->MSHR_cmd_order[c] = CACHE_WRITEBACK; B_seen = true; break;
00185         case 'P': LLC->MSHR_cmd_order[c] = CACHE_PREFETCH; P_seen = true; break;
00186         default: fatal("unknown cache operation '%c' for -LLC:mshr_cmd; must be one of [RWBP]");
00187       }
00188     }
00189     if(!R_seen || !W_seen || !B_seen || !P_seen)
00190       fatal("-LLC:mshr_cmd must contain *each* of [RWBP]");
00191   }
00192 
00193   if(LLC_access_rate & (LLC_access_rate-1))
00194     fatal("-LLC:rate must be power of two");
00195   LLC_cycle_mask = LLC_access_rate-1;
00196 
00197   LLC->PFF_size = LLC_PFFsize;
00198   LLC->PFF = (cache_t::PFF_t*) calloc(LLC_PFFsize,sizeof(*LLC->PFF));
00199   if(!LLC->PFF)
00200     fatal("failed to calloc %s's prefetch FIFO",LLC->name);
00201   prefetch_buffer_create(LLC,LLC_PF_buffer_size);
00202   prefetch_filter_create(LLC,LLC_PF_filter_size,LLC_PF_filter_reset);
00203   LLC->prefetch_threshold = LLC_PFthresh;
00204   LLC->prefetch_max = LLC_PFmax;
00205   LLC->PF_low_watermark = LLC_low_watermark;
00206   LLC->PF_high_watermark = LLC_high_watermark;
00207   LLC->PF_sample_interval = LLC_WMinterval;
00208 
00209   LLC->prefetcher = (struct prefetch_t**) calloc(LLC_num_PF?LLC_num_PF:1/* avoid 0-size alloc */,sizeof(*LLC->prefetcher));
00210   LLC->num_prefetchers = LLC_num_PF;
00211   if(!LLC->prefetcher)
00212     fatal("couldn't calloc %s's prefetcher array",LLC->name);
00213   for(int i=0;i<LLC_num_PF;i++)
00214     LLC->prefetcher[i] = prefetch_create(LLC_PF_opt_str[i],LLC);
00215   if(LLC->prefetcher[0] == NULL)
00216     LLC->num_prefetchers = LLC_num_PF = 0;
00217 
00218   LLC_bus = bus_create("LLC_bus",LLC->linesize,LLC_bus_ratio);
00219 
00220   //creq_size=1000;
00221   //creq_head=0;
00222   //creq_tail=0;
00223   //creq_num=0;
00224   //creq = (struct coherence_req*) calloc(creq_size,sizeof(*creq));
00225 
00226 }
00227 
00228 /* destructor */
00229 uncore_t::~uncore_t()
00230 {
00231 }

00234 void uncore_t::setup(uint no_nodes, uint vcs, uint max_sim_time)
00235 {
00236     address = myId();
00237     node_ip = address/3;
00238 
00239 #ifdef GEN_APP_TRACES
00240   char ch[50];
00241   sprintf (ch, "app-trace%d.out",node_ip);
00242   printf ("[%s] is a application trace file\n",ch);
00243   app_mem_trace = fopen(ch,"w");
00244   if(!app_mem_trace)
00245      fatal("could not open app trace file");
00246   log_trace=false;
00247 #endif
00248 /*
00249         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < ready.size(); i++)
00250                 ready[i] = true;
00251 */
00252 }

00265 
00266 void  uncore_reg_options(struct opt_odb_t * const odb)
00267 {
00268   opt_reg_string(odb, (char *)"-LLC",(char *)"last-level cache configuration string [DS]",
00269       &LLC_opt_str, /*default*/ (char *)"LLC:2048:16:64:16:64:12:L:W:B:8:1:8:C", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00270   opt_reg_string(odb, (char *)"-LLC:mshr_cmd",(char *)"last-level cache MSHR scheduling policy [DS]",
00271       &LLC_MSHR_cmd, /*default*/ LLC_MSHR_cmd, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00272   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:bus",(char *)"CPU clock cycles per LLC-bus cycle [DS]",
00273       &LLC_bus_ratio, /*default*/ 1, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00274   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:rate",(char *)"access LLC once per this many cpu clock cycles [DS]",
00275       &LLC_access_rate, /*default*/ 1, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00276 
00277   /* LLC prefetch control options */
00278   opt_reg_string_list(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf", (char *)"last-level cache prefetcher configuration string(s) [DS]",
00279       LLC_PF_opt_str, MAX_PREFETCHERS, &LLC_num_PF, LLC_PF_opt_str, /* print */true, /* format */NULL, /* !accrue */false);
00280   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:fifosize",(char *)"LLC prefetch FIFO size [DS]",
00281       &LLC_PFFsize, /*default*/ 16, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00282   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:buffer",(char *)"LLC prefetch buffer size [DS]",
00283       &LLC_PF_buffer_size, /*default*/ 0, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00284   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:filter",(char *)"LLC prefetch filter size [DS]",
00285       &LLC_PF_filter_size, /*default*/ 0, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00286   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:filterreset",(char *)"LLC prefetch filter reset interval (cycles) [DS]",
00287       &LLC_PF_filter_reset, /*default*/ 65536, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00288   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:thresh",(char *)"LLC prefetch threshold (only prefetch if MSHR occupancy < thresh) [DS]",
00289       &LLC_PFthresh, /*default*/ 4, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00290   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:max",(char *)"maximum LLC prefetch requests in MSHRs at a time [DS]",
00291       &LLC_PFmax, /*default*/ 2, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00292   opt_reg_double(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:lowWM",(char *)"LLC low watermark for prefetch control [DS]",
00293       &LLC_low_watermark, /*default*/ 0.1, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00294   opt_reg_double(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:highWM",(char *)"LLC high watermark for prefetch control [DS]",
00295       &LLC_high_watermark, /*default*/ 0.5, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00296   opt_reg_int(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:WMinterval",(char *)"LLC sampling interval (in cycles) for prefetch control (0 = no PF controller) [DS]",
00297       &LLC_WMinterval, /*default*/ 100, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00298   opt_reg_flag(odb, (char *)"-LLC:pf:miss",(char *)"generate LLC prefetches only from miss traffic [DS]",
00299       &LLC_PF_on_miss, /*default*/ false, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00300   opt_reg_double(odb, (char *)"-cpu:speed", (char *)"CPU speed in MHz [DS]",
00301         &cpu_speed, /*default*/4000.0,/*print*/true,/*format*/NULL); 
00302 }
00303 
00304 /* register all of the stats */
00305 void uncore_t::uncore_reg_stats(struct uncore_t * uncore,struct stat_sdb_t * const sdb)
00306 {
00307   char buf[1024];
00308   char buf2[256];
00309   char buf3[256];
00310   //char buf2[1024];
00311 
00312   stat_reg_note(sdb,"\n#### LAST-LEVEL CACHE STATS ####");
00313   LLC_reg_stats(sdb, uncore->LLC);
00314   bus_reg_stats(sdb, NULL, uncore->LLC_bus);
00315 
00316 
00317   stat_reg_note(sdb,"\n#### UNCORE STATS ####");
00318 
00319   sprintf(buf,"u%d.packets_sent_out",uncore->node_ip);
00320   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "total number of packets sent out", &uncore->stat.packets_out, uncore->stat.packets_out, NULL);
00321   sprintf(buf,"u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip);
00322   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "total number of packets received", &uncore->stat.packets_in, uncore->stat.packets_in, NULL);
00323   sprintf(buf,"u%d.min_pkt_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00324   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "minimum packet latency", &uncore->stat.min_pkt_latency, uncore->stat.min_pkt_latency, NULL);
00325   sprintf(buf,"u%d.last_packet_out_cycle",uncore->node_ip);
00326   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "last packet out cycle", &uncore->stat.last_packet_out_cycle, uncore->stat.last_packet_out_cycle, NULL);
00327 
00328   sprintf(buf,"u%d.round_trip_lat",uncore->node_ip);
00329   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "round trip latency", &uncore->stat.round_trip_lat, uncore->stat.round_trip_lat, NULL);
00330   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_round_trip_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00331   sprintf(buf2,"average round trip latency");
00332   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.round_trip_lat/u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00333   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00334 
00335   sprintf(buf,"u%d.fwd_path_delay",uncore->node_ip);
00336   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "forward path delay", &uncore->stat.fwd_path_delay, uncore->stat.fwd_path_delay, NULL);
00337   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_fwd_path_delay",uncore->node_ip);
00338   sprintf(buf2,"average fwd path delay");
00339   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.fwd_path_delay/u%d.packets_sent_out",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00340   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00341 
00342   sprintf(buf,"u%d.round_trip_network_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00343   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "round trip network latency", &uncore->stat.round_trip_network_latency, uncore->stat.round_trip_network_latency, NULL);
00344   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_round_trip_network_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00345   sprintf(buf2,"avg round trip network latency");
00346   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.round_trip_network_latency/u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00347   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00348 
00349   sprintf(buf,"u%d.round_trip_hop_count",uncore->node_ip);
00350   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "round trip hop count", &uncore->stat.round_trip_hop_count, uncore->stat.round_trip_hop_count, NULL);
00351   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_round_trip_hop_count",uncore->node_ip);
00352   sprintf(buf2,"avg round trip hop count");
00353   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.round_trip_hop_count/u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00354   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00355 
00356   sprintf(buf,"u%d.round_trip_memory_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00357   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "round trip memory latency", &uncore->stat.round_trip_memory_latency, uncore->stat.round_trip_memory_latency, NULL);
00358   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_round_trip_memory_latency",uncore->node_ip);
00359   sprintf(buf2,"avg round trip memory latency");
00360   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.round_trip_memory_latency/u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00361   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00362 
00363   sprintf(buf,"u%d.waiting_in_ni",uncore->node_ip);
00364   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, "waiting in NI", &uncore->stat.waiting_in_ni, uncore->stat.waiting_in_ni, NULL);
00365   sprintf(buf,"u%d.avg_waiting_in_ni",uncore->node_ip);
00366   sprintf(buf2,"avg waiting in ni");
00367   sprintf(buf3,"u%d.waiting_in_ni/u%d.packets_in",uncore->node_ip,uncore->node_ip);
00368   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, buf, buf2, buf3, "%12.4f");
00369 
00370 }

00372 
00373 
00374 /*informs the uncore that the network is ready to ceive a packet for a given virtual channel*/
00375 void
00376 uncore_t::handle_ready_event(IrisEvent* e)
00377 {
00378 
00379     ready[e->vc] = true;        /*Set the ready event for a given VC*/
00380     delete e;
00381     return ;
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 void uncore_t::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00386 {
00387     switch(e->type)
00388     {
00389         case NEW_PACKET_EVENT:
00390             handle_new_packet_event(e);
00391             break;
00392         case READY_EVENT:
00393             handle_ready_event(e);
00394             break;
00395         default:
00396             break;
00397     }
00398     return;
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 void uncore_t::handle_new_packet_event( IrisEvent* e)
00403 {
00404     ni_recv = false;
00405     HighLevelPacket* hlp = static_cast<HighLevelPacket* >( e->event_data.at(0));
00406     double lat = Simulator::Now() - hlp->sent_time;
00407 
00408     stat.last_packet_out_cycle = Simulator::Now();
00409 
00410     if( stat.min_pkt_latency > lat)
00411         stat.min_pkt_latency = lat;
00412 
00413     stat.packets_in++;
00414 
00415     stat.round_trip_hop_count += hlp->hop_count;
00416     stat.round_trip_network_latency += (ullint)hlp->avg_network_latency;
00417     stat.round_trip_memory_latency += hlp->stat_memory_serviced_time;
00418     stat.waiting_in_ni += hlp->waiting_in_ni;
00419 
00420     Request * req = new Request();
00421 
00422     convertFromBitStream(req,hlp);
00423 
00424     req->startTime = hlp->req_start_time;
00425 
00426 
00427 #ifdef USE_PIN_TRACES
00428    req->address = GlobalAddrRip(req->address,node_ip);
00429 #endif
00430 
00431     //cout << "[" << dec << sim_cycle << "] Packet returned to Uncore " << dec << node_ip << " Address 0x" << hex << req->address << endl;
00432 
00433     stat.round_trip_lat += ((ullint)Simulator::Now() - req->startTime);
00434 
00435     fill_arrived_llc(LLC,req->address);
00436     delete hlp;
00437 
00438     // send back a ready event
00439     IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00440     event2->type = READY_EVENT;
00441     event2->vc = hlp->virtual_channel;
00442     Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, interface_connections[0], event2);
00443 
00444     delete req;
00445     delete e;
00446     return ;
00447 } 
00448 
00449 bool uncore_t::enqueuable(const md_paddr_t addr,const enum cache_command cmd,tick_t when_enqueued)
00450 {
00451 
00452     sending =false;
00453     bool found = false;
00454     sending_vc = -1;
00455     //uint old_last_vc = last_vc;
00456     for( uint i=last_vc+1; i<vcs; i++)
00457     {
00458         if(ready[i])
00459         {
00460             found = true;
00461             sending_vc = i;
00462             last_vc = i;
00463             break;
00464         }
00465     }
00466     if ( !found)
00467     {
00468         for ( uint i=0; i<=last_vc; i++)
00469         {
00470             if(ready[i])
00471             {
00472                 found = true;
00473                 sending_vc = i;
00474                 last_vc = i;
00475                 break;
00476             }
00477         }
00478     }
00479 
00480 
00481         if(found)
00482                 return true;
00483         else
00484                 return false;
00485         
00486 }
00487 
00488 void uncore_t::enqueue(struct cache_t * const prev_cp,const enum cache_command cmd,const md_paddr_t addr,const int linesize,const seq_t action_id,
00489                         const int MSHR_bank,const int MSHR_index,void * const op,void (*const cb)(void *),seq_t (*const get_action_id)(void *))
00490 {
00491         
00492 #ifdef GEN_APP_TRACES
00493 if(log_trace)
00494         fprintf(app_mem_trace,"0x%llx %lld %d\n",addr,sim_cycle,cmd);
00495 #endif
00496 
00497         Request *req = new Request();
00498         req->cmdType = cmd;
00499 #ifdef USE_PIN_TRACES
00500         //cout << "Uncore" << node_ip  << "Changed address from 0x" << hex << addr;
00501         req->address = GlobalAddrMap(addr,node_ip);
00502         //cout << " to 0x" << req->address ;
00503 #else
00504         req->address = addr;
00505 #endif
00506         req->arrivalTime = sim_cycle;
00507         req->threadId = node_ip;
00508         //req->address = GlobalAddrMap(addr,node_ip);   
00509 
00510         req->mcNo = get_mcNo(req->address);
00511         req->mcNo = mc_node_ip[req->mcNo];
00512         stat.packets_out++;
00513         stat.fwd_path_delay += (ullint)(Simulator::Now() - req->arrivalTime);
00514         HighLevelPacket* hlp = new HighLevelPacket();
00515 
00516 
00517         //cout << endl << "[" << dec << sim_cycle <<  "][Uncore" << dec << node_ip << "]" << " Sending packet Address 0x" << hex << addr << " to 0x" << req->address << "  CommandType " << dec<< req->cmdType << endl;
00518         /*Setting HighLevelPacket values*/
00519         hlp->virtual_channel = sending_vc;
00520         hlp->source = address;
00521         hlp->destination = req->mcNo;
00522         hlp->addr = req->address;
00523         hlp->transaction_id = 1000;
00524         convertToBitStream(req, hlp);
00525         if(hlp->sent_time < Simulator::Now())
00526             hlp->sent_time = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+1;
00527         hlp->req_start_time = sim_cycle;
00528 
00529         /*Sending HLP to the interface*/
00530         ready[sending_vc] = false;
00531         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00532         event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00533         event->event_data.push_back(hlp);
00534         event->vc = sending_vc;
00535         Simulator::Schedule( hlp->sent_time, &NetworkComponent::process_event, interface_connections[0], event );
00536 
00537         delete req;
00538 }
00539 
00540 
00541 extern unsigned int THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00542 md_paddr_t GlobalAddrMap(md_paddr_t addr, unsigned int  threadId)
00543 {
00544     md_paddr_t newAddr;
00545     unsigned long long int threadBits = (unsigned long long int)ceil(log2(NO_OF_THREADS));
00546     unsigned long int threadBitsPos = THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00547     md_paddr_t lowerMask = (md_paddr_t)pow(2.0,threadBitsPos*1.0)-1;
00548     md_paddr_t upperMask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFLLU << threadBitsPos;
00549     md_paddr_t lowerAddr = addr & lowerMask;
00550     md_paddr_t upperAddr = addr & upperMask;
00551 #ifdef USE_PIN_TRACES
00552 
00553 #endif
00554     md_paddr_t threadAddr = (threadId & ((md_paddr_t)pow(2.0,threadBits*1.0)-1));
00555     newAddr = lowerAddr | (threadAddr << threadBitsPos)| (upperAddr << threadBits);     
00556     return newAddr;
00557 }
00558 
00559 md_paddr_t GlobalAddrRip(md_paddr_t addr, unsigned int  threadId)
00560 {
00561     md_paddr_t newAddr;
00562     unsigned long long int threadBits = (unsigned long long int)ceil(log2(NO_OF_THREADS));
00563     unsigned long int threadBitsPos = THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00564     md_paddr_t lowerMask = (md_paddr_t)pow(2.0,threadBitsPos*1.0)-1;
00565     md_paddr_t upperMask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFLLU << threadBitsPos;
00566     md_paddr_t lowerAddr = addr & lowerMask;
00567     md_paddr_t upperAddr = addr >> threadBitsPos;
00568     md_paddr_t threadAddr = upperAddr & (NO_OF_THREADS-1) ;
00569     upperAddr = upperAddr >> (unsigned long long int)ceil(log2(NO_OF_THREADS)) ;
00570     upperAddr = upperAddr << threadBitsPos ;
00571     
00572 #ifdef USE_PIN_TRACES
00573     //cout << "Uncore[" << dec<< threadId << "] Original address 0x" << hex << lowerAddr << " Node_ip taken 0x" << dec << upperAddr << endl;
00574 #endif
00575     if(threadAddr!=threadId)
00576     {
00577         cout << "Uncore[" << dec<< threadId << "] Original address 0x" << hex << lowerAddr << " Node_ip taken " << dec << upperAddr << endl;
00578         fprintf(stdout,"\n[%lld]UpperAddr= 0x%lld Returned addr= 0x%llx",sim_cycle,upperAddr, addr);
00579         //fprintf(stdout,"\nIntsructions completed %lld",uncores[threadId]->core[0]->stat.oracle_total_insn);
00580         assert(threadAddr!=threadId); 
00581     }
00582     
00583     newAddr = upperAddr| lowerAddr;     
00584 
00585     return newAddr;
00586 }
00587 
00588 
00589 
00590 
00591 short int get_mcNo(md_paddr_t req_addr)
00592 {
00593 
00594     md_paddr_t *addr = &req_addr;
00595     unsigned int temp = MC_ADDR_BITS;   
00596     unsigned int temp2 = temp-(int)log2(no_mcs);   
00597     unsigned int lower_mask = (uint)pow(2.0,temp2*1.0)-1;
00598     md_paddr_t upper_mask = (ullint)((0xFFFFFFFFFFFF)-(pow(2.0,temp*1.0)-1));
00599     unsigned int lower_addr = (*addr) & lower_mask;
00600     md_paddr_t upper_addr = ((*addr) & upper_mask) >> (int)log2(no_mcs);
00601 
00602 #ifdef GLOBAL_XOR
00603     short int tempBits = (int)log2(NO_OF_THREADS) - (int)log2(no_mcs);
00604     short int tempFactor = ((id >> tempBits) & (no_mcs-1));
00605     short int mc_addr = (((*addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1)) ^ tempFactor;
00606 #else    
00607     short int mc_addr = ((*addr) >> temp2) & (no_mcs-1);
00608 #endif
00609 
00610     *addr = upper_addr | lower_addr;
00611     return mc_addr;
00612 }
00613 
00614 
00615 void uncore_t::convertToBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket* hlp)
00616 {
00617     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS ; i++ )
00618     {
00619         unsigned long long int bit_addr = (req->address >> i);
00620         bool bit = (bool)(bit_addr & 0x1);
00621         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00622     }
00623     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS ; i++ )
00624     {
00625         bool bit = (bool)((req->cmdType >> i) & 0x1);
00626         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00627     }
00628     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS ; i++ )
00629     {
00630         bool bit = (bool)((req->threadId >> i) & 0x1);
00631         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00632     }
00633     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITEBACK)
00634     {   for ( uint i = hlp->data.size() ; i < (8*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE - max_phy_link_bits); i++ )
00635         {
00636             hlp->data.push_back(true);
00637         }
00638         hlp->msg_class = RESPONSE_PKT;
00639     }
00640     else
00641         hlp->msg_class = ONE_FLIT_REQ;
00642 
00643     hlp->data_payload_length = uint(ceil(hlp->data.size() *1.0 / max_phy_link_bits));   
00644     hlp->data_payload_length = hlp->data_payload_length * max_phy_link_bits;
00645     hlp->sent_time = req->arrivalTime;
00646     for ( uint i=hlp->data.size() ; i < hlp->data_payload_length; i++ )
00647         hlp->data.push_back(false);
00648 
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 
00653 void uncore_t::convertFromBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket *hlp)
00654 {
00655     req->address = 0x0; 
00656     req->mcNo=hlp->source/3;
00657     //cout << endl;
00658     for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS; i++)
00659     {
00660         //cout << dec << hlp->data[i]<<endl;
00661         unsigned long long int bit = hlp->data[i] ;
00662         req->address = req->address | bit << i;
00663         //cout<< hex << req->address <<endl;
00664     }
00665     //cout << "Returned address" << hex << req->address << endl;
00666     req->address = req->address & (0xFFFFFFFFFFFF) ;
00667 
00668     //cout << "\n BitstreamReqAddress " <<  hex << req->address ; 
00669 /*    unsigned int temp = 0;
00670     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS; i++)
00671     {
00672         temp = temp | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS] << i);
00673     }
00674     req->cmdType = (cache_command)temp;
00675 
00676     req->threadId = 0;
00677     for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS; i++)
00678     {
00679         req->threadId = req->threadId | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS+NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS] << i);
00680     }
00681 */
00682 
00683     req->data.value = 0;
00684     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_READ || req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITE || req->cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH)
00685         for ( uint i = NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS; i < (8*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE - max_phy_link_bits); i++ )
00686         {
00687             req->data.value = req->data.value | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS] << i);
00688             req->data.size = CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE;
00689         }
00690 }
00691 
00692 string
00693 uncore_t::toString () const
00694 {
00695     stringstream str;
00696     str << "\nUncore: "
00697         << "\t vcs: " << ready.size()
00698         << "\t address: " <<address
00699         << "\t node_ip: " << node_ip
00700         << "\t int address: " << interface_connections[0]->address
00701         ;
00702     return str.str();
00703 }
